mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.track_id, t.artist_id, t.album_id, t.title, t.like_count, t.youtube_url, a.artist, al.album_name, al.album_img, al.release_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t.album_id ORDER BY t.track_id) AS rn FROM tracks t LEFT JOIN Artists a ON t.artist_id = a.artist_id LEFT JOIN Albums al ON t.album_id = al.album_id WHERE LOWER(t.title) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) sub WHERE rn = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t.track_id, t.artist_id, t.album_id, a.artist, a.artist_img, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY t.artist_id ORDER BY t.track_id) AS rn FROM tracks t LEFT JOIN Artists a ON t.artist_id = a.artist_id WHERE LOWER(a.artist) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{keyword} || '%') ) sub WHERE rn = 1
